availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ohio soldier. Native of Germany. Served in the 63rd Ohio Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as private from October 20, 1861, to September 27, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Michigan, U.S., Death Records, 1867-1952, Michigan Department of Community Health, Division for Vital Records and Health Statistics; Lansing, MI, File 1041502.
Official Roster of the Soldiers of the State of Ohio in the War of the Rebellion, 1861-1866, Vol. 5 (Akron: The Wener PTG and MFG Co., 1887), p. 392.
_U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Kentucky, Roll 414, Application 54837, Certificate 37241.
"PVt Cooney Wolfe (1845-1883)," Find A Grave, Memorial 68457177, accessed October 1, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/68457177.
